in may 2021 i published an investigation into the deadly toll of amazon's trucking boom, today, a year+ LATER, the WSJ published a report on the very same topic, featuring the same crash and similar statistics and methods ‚Äî not a single reference to the reporting that came before pic.twitter.com/9kV2PhoATC

— paris martineau (@parismartineau) September 22, 2022
